Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using C57BL/6 mice.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were significantly reduced in mice with the A30P mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three groups of mice were used for biological replication.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Î±-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
